archimate:BusinessProcess.name: (L1)(h175) ILS process
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
H175 differs from H160 because this program is now in serie phase. In terms of figures, for instance, for the H175 program: - 2000 ECP the 1st year (Engineering Change Proposal) ; - 1200 the 2nd year.
Before definition freeze, there is few traceability at Design Office level. LSA starts at CDR of the system, but these milestones are not always passed with all criteria fulfilled. Some milestones are passed without the corresponding maturity level (e.g.: reliability data, data from supply chain). As consequences: - To search for data is time consuming ; - Lot of cycles to complete the LSA data (with payment to the supply chain). Since data are not up-to-date and that the activity is subcontracted, this induces additional costs. The overall costs is quantifiable.
